english.segment1: Here I am longing, I can't stop this longing. For more of You in me. Lost in this moment, This beautiful moment. This prayer I sing to You. I'm crying out to You. To change the way I think, To steal away my pride. And make me new.
english.segment2: Saturate my life, Fill every part of me with You. Drown me in Your love, Let me lose myself in You.
english.segment3: Here I am longing, I can't stop this longing. For more of You in me. Lost in this moment, This beautiful moment. This prayer I sing to You. I gladly come to You, I want no place to hide. I'm pouring out my heart. To give You room.
english.segment4: Saturate my life, Fill every part of me with You. Drown me in Your love, Let me lose myself in You.
